attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Red squirrels are under attack from the grey squirrels. Lets protect their habitats.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the red squirrels."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11224.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Redsquirrels/
